TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EvalErrorObject extends Microsoft.JScript.ErrorObject

Docs.summary: Represents an error that occurs when the method is used. For more information, see [eval Method (Visual Studio - JScript)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8af3274a-ce81-46db-854c-25db60cd9b38).
